title: Loud Static Noise in Highlights After Creation [CLIENT]

embed.description: Turn down volume to a single digit or else.

body:
CAUTION:  Turn down volume before listening to it.  My ears died already and I don't want yours to fall to the same fate. 

When trying to view a highlight that I create, I have the sound replaced with a very loud ear piercing static noise that kills ears upon normal volume.  Has happened in both patch 6.22 and 6.23.

Steps to create:
1. Used the download replay in the post game lobby
2. Created the highlight using the recording feature now in the replays.
3. Went to where the highlight was saved and opened it in Google Chrome.
4. Listened to my hearing fade as blood filled my ears.

This is happening to me every time I try to create a highlight.

Hope this helps.  Haven't seen anything about this so far.

replies.body: I have the same problem, tried in VLC player and firefox and still get that same type of screech.
Bump for emphasis. Had the same problem for months
I get this same problem, has this been addressed/fixed?
I don't get as loud as your videos, but it's still buzzing sound in the background
